Verses: 1 noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Siththeemilirundhu Vevukaararaagiya Irandu Manusharai Ragasiyamaai Vevupaarkkumbadi Anuppi: Neengal Poi Dhesaththaiyum Erigovaiyum Paarththuvaarungal Endraan. Avargal Poi, Raagaab Ennum Peyarkonda Vesiyin Veettukkul Piravesiththu, Ange Thanginaargal.
2 dhesaththai Vevupaarkkumbadi, Isravel Puththiraril Sila Manushar Indha Raaththiriyile Inge Vandhaargal Endru Erigovin Raajaavukkuch Sollappattadhu.

3 appozhudhu Erigovin Raajaa Raagaabandaikku Aal Anuppi: Unnidaththil Vandhu, Un Veettukkul Piravesiththa Manusharai Veliye Konduvaa; Avargal Dhesaththaiyellaam Vevupaarkkumbadi Vandhaargal Endru Sollasonnaan.
4 andha Sthiree Avvirandu Manusharaiyum Kondupoi Avargalai Oliththu Vaiththu: Meydhaan, Ennidaththil Manushar Vandhirundhaargal; Aanaalum Avargal Evvidaththaaro Enakkuth Theriyaadhu.

5 vaasalai Adaikkum Neraththil Iruttuvelaiyile, Andha Manushar Purappattup Poivittaargal; Avargal Enge Ponaargalo Enakkuth Theriyaadhu; Avargalaich Seekkiramaaip Poiththedungal; Neengal Avargalaip Pidiththukkollalaam Endraal.
6 aval Avargalai Veettinmel Erappanni, Veettinmel Parappappatta Sanal Thattaigalukkulle Maraiththu Vaiththirundhaal.
7 andha Manushar Yordhaanukkup Pogira Vazhiyil Thuraigal Mattum Avargalaith Thedapponaargal; Avargalaith Thedugiravargal Purappattavudane Vaasal Adaikkappattadhu.
8 andha Manushar Paduththukkollumunne Aval Veettinmel Avargalidaththirku Erippoi,
9 karththar Ungalukku Dhesaththai Oppukkoduththaarendrum, Ungalaippatri Engalukkuth Thigil Pidiththirukkiradhendrum, Ungalaikkuriththu Dhesaththuk Kudigal Ellaarum Sorndhuponaargal Endrum Ariven.

10 neengal Egipdhilirundhu Purappattapodhu, Karththar Ungalukku Munbaagach Sivandha Samuththiraththin Thanneerai Vatrippogappanninadhaiyum, Neengal Yordhaanukku Appuraththil Sangaaram Pannina Emoriyarin Irandu Raajaakkalaagiya Seekonukkum Okukkum Seydhadhaiyum Kelvippattom.
11 kelvippattapodhu Engal Irudhayam Karaindhupoyitru, Ungalaale Ellaarudaiya Dhairiyamum Atruppoyitru; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththare Uyara Vaanaththilum Keezhe Boomiyilum Dhevanaanavar.
12 ippodhum Naan Ungalukkuth Dhayavu Seydhabadiyinaal, Neengalum Engal Thagappan Kudumbaththukkuth Dhayavuseyvom Endru Karththarperil Enakku Aanaiyittu,

13 neengal En Thagappanaiyum En Thaayaiyum En Sagodhararaiyum En Sagodharigalaiyum Avargalukku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Uyirode Vaiththu, Engal Jeevanaich Saavukkuth Thappuvikkumbadi, Enakku Nichchayamaana Adaiyaalaththaik Kodukkavendum Endraal.

14 appozhudhu Andha Manushar Avalai Nokki: Engal Jeevane Ungal Jeevanukku Eedu; Neengal Engal Kaariyaththai Velippaduththaadhirundhaal, Karththar Engalukkuth Dhesaththaik Tukkumpodhu, Naangal Thayaiyum Saththiyamum Paaraattuvom Endraargal.
15 appozhudhu Avargalaik Kayitrinaale Jannalvazhiyaai Irakkivittaal; Aval Veedu Alangaththin Madhilil Irundhadhu; Alangaththile Aval Kudiyirundhaal.
16 appozhudhu Aval Avargalai Nokki: Thedugiravargal Ungalaik Kaanaadhabadikku, Neengal Malaiyile Poi, Avargal Thirumbivarumattum Ange Moondrunaal Oliththirundhu, Pinbu Ungal Vazhiye Pongal Endraal.

17 appozhudhu Andha Manushar Avalai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Dhesaththukkul Piravesikkumbodhu, Nee Indha Sivappunool Kayitrai Engalai Irakkivitta Jannalile Katti, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Un Sagodharargalaiyum Un Thagappan Kudumbaththaar Anaivaraiyum Unnidaththil Un Veettile Serththukkol.
18 illaavittaal Nee Engal Kaiyil Vaangina Aanaikku Neengalaayiruppom.

19 evanaagilum Un Veettu Vaasalgalilirundhu Veliye Purappattaal, Avanudaiya Raththappazhi Avan Thalaiyinmel Irukkum; Engalmel Kutram Illai; Unnode Veettil Irukkira Evanmelaagilum Kaipodappattadheyaagil, Avanudaiya Raththappazhi Engal Thalaiyinmel Irukkum.
20 nee Engal Kaariyaththai Velippaduththinaayeyaanaal, Nee Engal Kaiyil Vaangina Aanaikku Neengalaayiruppom Endraargal.
21 adharku Aval: Ungal Vaarththaiyinbadiye Aagakkadavadhu Endru Solli, Avargalai Anuppivittaal; Avargal Poivittaargal; Pinbu Aval Andhach Sivappuk Kayitrai Jannalile Kattivaiththaal.
22 avargal Poi, Malaiyile Serndhu Thedugiravargal Thirumbivarumattum, Moondru Naal Ange Thariththirundhaargal; Thedugiravargal Vazhiyellaam Avargalaith Thediyum Kaanaadheponaargal.
23 andha Irandu Manusharum Thirumbi, Malaiyilirundhu Irangi, Aatraikkadandhu, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavinidaththil Vandhu, Thangalukkuch Sambaviththa Yaavaiyum Avanukkuth Theriviththu;
24 karththar Dhesaththaiyellaam Nammudaiya Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Dhesaththin Kudigalellaam Namakkumunbaagach Sorndhuponaargal Endru Avanode Sonnaargal.
